title: Cello suite n.29 Montecarlo Night 700ML
description: In this sun-kissed fragrance, hints of bergamot and mandarin mix, all enhanced by the opulent and velvety heart notes of jasmine and orange blossom, ending in base notes with the enveloping scent of rare and precious musky aromas.Warm and sensual fragrance with a seductive embrace.Very suitable in the living area and in environments where you want to create an atmosphere of relaxation and good humor.Floral top and heart notes that end in a background of subtle musky aromas.Top : mandarin bergamotHeart : jasmine, rose, orange blossom, patchouliBase : white musk700MLPresented in an EDION box. Comes in an exclusive bottle designed for JOY&CO, in smoked olive green with gold leaf.Silk Black Sticks included.Made in Italy.

title: Crystal Hobnail Jug with Gold Handle
description: Prepare to liven up any casual indoor or outdoor gathering with this all-purpose handmade hobnail crystal glass jug. title: Glitchy Willow Dessert Plate - Classics on Acid
